---

# Checklist

## Spot Checks

- [ ] File name
- [ ] Date
- [ ] Author
- [ ] Not in draft mode
- [ ] Tags

## Editing passes

- [ ] Edited for clarity
- [ ] Proof-reading
- [ ] Internal and external links

## Social

- [ ] HackerNews
- [ ] Reddit
- [ ] Twitter
- [ ] Discord
- [ ] Mailing list (MailerLite)
